title: Independent Apartment on Marina with Beach Access
description: Luxury 1 bedroom apartment in Sparkle Tower with stunning marina views, just 7 minutes from JBR Beach.
full_description: Apartment is located in Dubai marina, 2 minutes walk to JBR beach. If you know Dubai, this is one of the most popular areas to live in. Sparkle tower is conveniently located in between the marina and the beach with marina view. You will enjoy access to lots of cafes, restaurants, and bars on the marina promenade and JBR walk, a very popular pool bar called BLA BLA is at a 2 mins walk. Everything is within walking distance, including metro if you want to go to other areas.
location_description: Situated in Sparkle Tower between Dubai Marina and JBR Beach, this apartment offers convenient access to restaurants, cafes, and bars. The BLA BLA beach club is just 2 minutes away, and public transportation options include tram (1 min) and metro (10 min).

title: Stunning Studio in JLT
description: Beautiful 36m² studio with lake views in JLT, perfect for couples and small families.
full_description: This studio apartment with lake views in JLT is the perfect getaway for couples and small families. It is fully furnished with first-class amenities to ensure a pleasant stay. There are plenty of nearby activities, shopping, and dining options. The apartment is also conveniently located near the metro station and other public transportation links, giving you easy access to the rest of the city.
location_description: Located in Jumeirah Lake Towers (JLT) with beautiful lake views and easy access to Dubai Marina. The apartment is close to the metro station, making it convenient to explore Dubai.

title: JBR Whole Studio | 2 Min to Beach | Ain Dubai nearby
description: Cozy studio apartment in JBR with easy access to the beach, Dubai Marina, and Ain Dubai.
full_description: This is nice and cozy studio apartment situated in JBR, very close to Ain Dubai, Bluewater island, Metro station, tram station is nearby, Dubai Marina canal, promenade, clubs, cafes, restaurants are all nearby. 2 min walk to the beach JBR, 4 mins walk to Metro station. This is an independent studio Apartment with 85 inch 4K TV.
location_description: Located in Jumeirah Beach Residence (JBR), this studio is only 2 minutes from the beach and 4 minutes from the Metro station. You'll be close to Ain Dubai, Bluewater Island, and the vibrant Dubai Marina area with its many dining and entertainment options.

title: Dubai Marina - Stylish Studio Apartment
description: Modern and comfortable studio in the heart of Dubai Marina, walking distance to restaurants, cafes, and shopping centers.
full_description: Hello and welcome! We will be happy to welcome you to our home. Your home is in this modern and comfortable apartment located in the heart of 'DUBAI MARINA'. You can enjoy being in one of the most beautiful neighborhoods of Dubai, within walking distance to restaurants, cafes and shopping centers. Our apartment is suitable for families, couples and business travelers. You are sure to find everything you need during your stay in our home.
location_description: Located in the heart of Dubai Marina, this apartment is within walking distance to restaurants, cafes, and shopping centers. The beach is just an 11-minute walk away, making it perfect for beach lovers.

title: Elegant Escape: Pool, Gym & Sauna
description: Special discount on this beautiful apartment with access to pool, gym, and sauna in Dubai Marina.
full_description: Experience luxury living in our beautiful apartment in Dubai Marina. This elegant escape features 2 comfortable beds, access to a stunning pool, fully-equipped gym, and relaxing sauna. The apartment is designed with modern furnishings and comes fully equipped for your comfort. Currently offering a special discount, making this a great value for your Dubai stay.
location_description: Situated in Dubai Marina with easy access to JBR Beach, restaurants, and shopping. The location offers a perfect balance of relaxation and city excitement.

title: Cozy Couple Friendly Sea View Room Marina
description: Private room with king bed and sea views in a shared 3-bedroom apartment in Dubai Marina.
full_description: Private room in 3 bedroom apartment in Dubai Marina. Stepping outside you will be surrounded by marina walk & a large selection of restaurants, cafés, beaches, supermarkets etc. Features: Private room (king bed, own key & lock), shared bath (1 more room guests only), table lamps, dressing table, wardrobe, shared kitchen & balcony. The guest can access also the building amenities i.e. the gym, indoor & outdoor pool free of cost.
location_description: Located in Dubai Marina with beautiful sea views. The apartment is walking distance to Barasti Beach, Marina Walk, Dubai Harbour, Sky Dive, and a tram station. There are 24-hour supermarkets and pharmacies in the building, along with restaurants and cafes within 50 meters.

title: Livbnb - Casa Aruri | 1B Marina Escape
description: Comfortable 1-bedroom apartment with king bed in Dubai Marina.
full_description: Welcome to Casa Aruri, your comfortable 1-bedroom escape in Dubai Marina. This well-appointed apartment features a king-size bed and is ideally located for exploring the vibrant Marina area. Enjoy easy access to the beach, restaurants, and entertainment options that make Dubai Marina one of the city's most popular neighborhoods.
location_description: Located in Dubai Marina with easy beach access, the apartment is close to restaurants, cafes, and shopping centers. The neighborhood offers a vibrant atmosphere with plenty of entertainment options.

title: GuestReady - Elegant Studio in JLT
description: Stylish studio apartment in Jumeirah Lake Towers, close to Dubai Marina.
full_description: Welcome to this elegant studio apartment in Jumeirah Lake Towers (JLT). The property is professionally managed by GuestReady and offers a comfortable stay with all the amenities you need. The studio features two beds and is conveniently located near Dubai Marina, offering easy access to restaurants, shops, and attractions.
location_description: Located in Jumeirah Lake Towers (JLT), this studio is just a short distance from Dubai Marina. The area offers a range of dining and shopping options, with easy access to public transportation.

title: Stunning Views from Balcony | Master Room | 90th Floor
description: Private room with queen bed and breathtaking views from the 90th floor in Dubai Marina.
full_description: Experience Dubai from new heights in this master room on the 90th floor. The room features a comfortable queen bed and a private balcony offering stunning panoramic views of Dubai Marina and the city skyline. The high-floor location provides an unparalleled perspective of Dubai's architectural wonders and coastal beauty.
location_description: Located on the 90th floor of a tower in Dubai Marina, this room offers extraordinary views of the city. The central location provides access to all the amenities of Marina, with restaurants, shops, and the beach within walking distance.

title: Dubai Marina - Modern Designed - Gorgeous Studio
description: Beautiful studio apartment with modern design in Dubai Marina.
full_description: Welcome to this gorgeously designed studio apartment in Dubai Marina. The property features modern furnishings and a stylish interior that creates a comfortable and luxurious atmosphere for your stay. The studio is well-equipped with all the amenities you need for a pleasant experience in Dubai.
location_description: Located in Dubai Marina, this studio offers convenient access to beaches, restaurants, and shopping. The neighborhood is known for its vibrant atmosphere and stunning waterfront views.
